title: prime land for sale.
details:
This seven accares of land located between Kaluwanchikudy and Onthachimadam areas. This land is proximity to DS offce, VTC, CTB Depot, Wedding hall, Elders'home, Irrigation board, Police station. we can reach it by concrete road in both sides. One shelter is there with power connection and tube well. some body are doing corn and other subsidiary crops. It is registered under PLR scheme. we have clear deed and surveyor plan. These seven accares are covered with wire fence and concrete posts. we have divided it into two parts.

even we have go the ''court order'' after the land case. This is the prime land for residential, commercial, integrated agriculture and so on. about two kilo meter apart there is very tourist beach in Onthachimadam.
the prices are negotiable.
